title: Behind the Scenes of Apple’s Behind the Scenes of the ‘Scary Fast’ Keynote Film
content:
YouTuber Michael Tobin dove into a slew of technical and equipment details revealed in Apple’s behind-the-scenes mini-documentary. One detail a few people have noticed: “Scary Fast” was edited in Adobe Premiere Pro, not Apple’s own Final Cut Pro. Make of that what you will.

 ★
author: John Gruber
